resources.string: Your goal is to move all disks into one tower and arrange them in ascending order. Move one disk a time by dragging disk from one tower to another. Larger disk cannot be put on top of smaller ones. Unless specified, your final disk tower does not have to be the same (leftmost) one as in the beginning.\n Enjoy!
Developed by My Little Android Projects\n http://sites.google.com/site/myandroidprojects
